heading: HR00889
0: RESOLUTION EARNESTLY RECOMMENDING TO THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (DOH) THAT ABULUG COMMUNITY HOSPITAL IN ABULUG, CAGAYAN AND BANGAG INFIRMARY IN BANGAG, APARRI, CAGAYAN BE RE-OPERATIONALIZED AND ANNEXED TO THE CAGAYAN VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER (CVMC) TO ADDRESS THE IMMEDIATE MEDICAL NEEDS OF THE AFFECTED COMMUNITY
